name: Chicken Tacos
description: Delicious lovely Mexican tacos filled with seasoned chicken.
instructions: Season the chicken with spices Cook the chicken on a grill or stovetop Warm the tortillas Assemble the tacos with chicken, salsa, lettuce, and other desired toppings Serve and enjoy!
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon paprika, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 8 small tortillas, Salsa, lettuce, toppings of your choice

name: Avocado Toast
description: A simple and nutritious breakfast or snack option.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden. Mash the avocado and spread it on the toasted bread. Sprinkle salt, pepper, and red chili flakes. Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice. Optional: Add toppings like sliced tomatoes or feta cheese. Serve and enjoy!
ingredients: 2 slices of bread, 1 ripe avocado, Salt and pepper to taste, Red chili flakes, Olive oil, Lemon juice

name: Cheesy Chicken Burger
description: A delicious chicken burger made with a grilled chicken patty and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Season the chicken patty with salt, pepper and preferred spices. Grill or pan-fry the chicken patty until cooked through. Toast the burger bun on a grill or in a toaster. Spread your mayonese sauce on the bottom bun. Place the cooked chicken patty on top of the sauce. Layer lettuce, tomato slices, and onion rings on top of the chicken patty. Add additional toppings. Cover with the top bun. Serve the chicken burger with fries or a side salad.
ingredients: Chicken patty, Burger bun, Lettuce, Tomato, Onion, Sauce, Cheese, Pickles

name: Spicy Sushi Roll
description: A popular sushi roll made with fresh tuna and spicy mayo.
instructions: Prepare sushi rice. Cut fresh tuna into small cubes. Mix tuna with spicy mayo. Lay a sheet of seaweed on a sushi mat. Spread sushi rice evenly on the seaweed. Place the tuna mixture along with cucumber sticks on top of the rice. Roll the sushi tightly using the sushi mat. Slice the sushi roll into bite-sized pieces. Serve with soy sauce and pickled ginger.
ingredients: Sushi rice, Fresh tuna, Spicy mayo, Seaweed (nori), Cucumber, Soy sauce, Pickled ginger

name: Butter Chicken
description: Delicious Indian dish made with tender chicken in a rich and creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt ginger-garlic paste and spices. Grill or cook the marinated chicken until cooked. In a separate pan melt butter and saute onions until golden brown. Add tomato puree, spices and cream to the pan. Simmer for a few minutes. Add the cooked chicken to the sauce and simmer for another 5-10 minutes. Serve hot with naan or rice.
ingredients: 500g boneless chicken, 1 cup plain yogurt, 2 tablespoons ginger-garlic paste, 1 teaspoon turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon chili powder, 1 teaspoon garam masala, 1/2 cup butter, 1 large onion  finely chopped, 1 cup tomato puree, 1/2 cup heavy cream, Salt to taste
